channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump taps New York Rep. Elise Stefanik for U.N. ambassador
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump selected Rep. Elise Stefanik to be his ambassador to the United Nations on Sunday, and she accepted the nomination.

item.title: Democrats should have celebrated America’s stunning economic success–but they were intimidated by progressives

item.title: Escaping the Benchmark Trap: A Guide for Smarter Investing
item.description: Is it time to eschew the benchmark trap in favor of Warren Buffett's rule, "Don't lose capital?"

item.title: The Tyranny of IRR: A Reality Check on Private Market Returns

item.description: President-elect Donald Trump says that Tom Homan, his former acting U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement director, will serve as "border czar" in ...

item.title: America solved veterans’ unemployment within a decade—but ‘underemployment’ continues to hold back their talents
item.description: With national unemployment rates at historically low levels, veteran unemployment is now even lower, dropping to 2.8% last month.

item.title: No, Harris Did Not Run a ‘Flawless’ Campaign
item.description: Media figures making that claim are blaming everyone but the bad candidate herself.

item.title: What to know about Susie Wiles, the Trump operative who will be the first woman to serve as White House chief of staff
item.description: The first woman to serve as White House chief of staff has a 40-year career in GOP politics.

item.title: Polish Prime Minister Denies Pushing Trump-Russia Collusion Hoax, But Video Catches Him In A Lie
item.description: Polish Prime Minister Donald Tusk now says that he never pushed the Russia collusion hoax against Trump, but video evidence shows he did.

item.title: Climate talks open with calls for a path away from the 'road to ruin,' but the real focus is money

item.title: Here’s how HR leaders can help employees prepare and recover from a hurricane
item.description: With climate change on the rise, employers need to implement policies and measures to provide for workers in their time of need.

item.title: GOP senator offers to 'personally escort' McCormick to Senate orientation after Schumer hold
item.description: Sen. Mike Lee offered to escort Senator-elect Dave McCormick into the Capitol after Sen. Chuck Schumer declined to invite him to orientation.

item.title: In Defense Of Luce, The Vatican’s Gen Z Cartoon Mascot
item.description: A small anime girl with blue hair, a yellow raincoat, a rosary, and a walking staff has ignited a fierce generational divide on the internet.

item.title: The Lesson Some Leftists Have Learned From Trump’s Win Should Terrify Americans
item.description: Some leftists have concluded that they need to crack down even further on free speech, and Republicans should stay vigilant.

item.title: Trump selects Tom Homan, former ICE chief, as new 'border czar'
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump will tap Tom Homan, who ran the government's deportation agency in the first Trump administration, as his border czar.

item.title: Lying Corporate Media Are Responsible For Kamala Voters’ Delusional Despair
item.description: One cannot overstate just how much influence the corporate media has over the majority of leftists. No wonder they're shocked once again.

item.title: The Latino Swing to the Right Shouldn’t Be a Surprise
item.description: The signs were all there for Latinos to break for Republicans.

item.title: Help Us Fight Antisemitism — and Defend Israel
item.description: Someone has to speak out against the pro-Hamas factions.

item.title: Pro-Palestinian protesters plan anti-Veterans Day gathering at Columbia University: 'DISGUSTING'
item.description: Anti-Israel protesters are planning to gather at Columbia University to protest Veterans Day and "those martyred by the Israel-US war machine."

item.title: The Unsung Piloting Feats of Georgia Jipp
item.description: A new children’s book tells the tale of a young South Dakota woman who flew dozens of mercy missions during the great blizzards of 1949.

item.title: It’s Leftism, Stupid
item.description: Democrats will come up with all sorts of explanations for Kamala Harris’s defeat just to avoid the obvious one.

item.title: From Darwin to Wall Street: A Rebuttal
item.description: The problem within finance is its philosophical core; that is, the worldview upon which our analytical frameworks are based.

item.title: Book Review: The M&A Failure Trap
item.description: Massive M&A deals make headlines but too rarely make money for stockholders.

item.title: Working out at these times of day could reduce your risk of colorectal cancer by 11%, new study says
item.description: Study participants who were continuously physically active during the day also showed a lower risk of developing colorectal cancer.

item.title: ‘Saturday Night’ Reminds Us How Far The Unfunny Partisans At SNL Have Fallen
item.description: 'Saturday Night' is a wonderful celebration of a cultural moment, and pulls together a wonderfully cathartic story.
